name: Apartus
description:
Become the hero of Belmoral in a true OldSchool RPG game inspired by some of the best titles of the genre!

What Makes Apartus Unique?

  • -Explore The Great realm of Belmoral
  • -Learn powerful Skills and Unique Abilities
  • -Face Legendary Enemies
  • -Find Unique Items
  • -Craft Weapons/Armor




Apartus tells the story of Randall Colaric, a young man who decides to leave the monotonous life in his village to try to find one of the most powerful artifacts ever, the lost relic of King Joord. This adventure will take our hero to explore different places full of mysteries and secrets, in order to do so and find clues about the location of the powerful relic. During the adventure, Randall will encounter faithful allies and powerful enemies during his journey.
Featuring a classic turn-based combat, explore the possibilities that a wide variety of skills, weapons, armor and items have to offer.

What are you waiting for? LET THE FIRE BURN!
